column4: hi @ all, im runing hardy heron 8.04 and i got some network printer issues with a hp office jet
wat kind of issues?
i got actually 2 hp printers on my linksys wrt54g, one is an older 2600 series hp, and the newer officejet is the issue
i cant find it in auto detect mode
can you find it manually?
it doesnt even really show up as hp... on the router tho, just checked that :(
the older printer works fine tho right?
its not the router?
yep the older one works just fine
im guessign the new one has 102 in the end
so it isnt a router problem... did you follow the network printing instructions from the manual?
no manual :-( so i thought it might be just installing a driver or something like that
look up the latest drivers on hp's site
think i should give each pc on it a static ip ( one ip all the time the same ? )
yes... that way the computer knows exactly which one every time
wow i havent done that in a loooong time :(
on the linux i guess disable roaming mode ?\
ya
:) thank you. ima be right back i guess
any success
